title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I press the 'Finish' button in the JAR packager wizard, I receive the following error message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.'
OB: After pressing the 'Finish' button in the JAR packager wizard, an error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.'
EB: I expect to be able to create a JAR even if there are unsaved editors. If there are unsaved editors, there should be a dialog prompting me to save them before proceeding with JAR creation.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the JAR packager wizard
2. Enter all the necessary information in the wizard
3. Have at least one unsaved editor
4. Click on the 'Finish' button
